page.title: 11MENDIP WALK (PART 1)
page.content: I live on an estate at Coundon called "Tottenham Estate." I live in the east of Coundon. The street is called Mendip Walk. There are only twelve houses in our street and I live in number twelve. Numbers 1, 2, 3, 10, 11 and 12 are in a square with a little grass in the middle. The other houses go in a straight row. No traffic can go up our street. Numbers 1,2,3,10, 11 and 12 have garages and two bedrooms. The other houses have no garage and they are three bedroomed houses. We have a recreation ground quite near. 14 children live in our street,but there are no old people. The houses have been built 17 years. When it rains the grass goes all marshy. We have a bank at the bottom of the square and I like to skate there. Our front room is massive and people think we have knocked a wall out.
